library(tidyverse)
df <- yaml::read_yaml("../data/lookups.yml", error.label = "")

```{r setup}

```

## Global Statistics

Measures of global spatial autocorrelation.

```{r}
enframe(df$global) %>% 
  unnest_wider(value) %>% 
  mutate(pysal = replace_na(pysal, "")) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```

## Local Indicators of Spatial Association

Measures of local spatial autocorrelation. 

```{r}
df$lisas %>% 
  enframe() %>% 
  unnest_wider(value) %>% 
  mutate(pysal = map_chr(pysal, ~str_c(.x, collapse = ", "))) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```

### Not implemented

Functions present in Pysal that are not implemented in sfdep.

```{r}
df[["not implemented"]] %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  rename(`function` = value) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
